FLEAD_UPGRADED.title: Flead
FLEAD_UPGRADED.designer_note: Gains defense every turn and debuffs you.

VROC_UPGRADED.title: Vroc
VROC_UPGRADED.designer_note: Has a single evade, and wounds you. Has potential to do a fair amount of damage by continual wounds, but is paired with a goon that defends it.

VIXMALLI.name: Vixmalli
VIXMALLI.title: Cardinal
VIXMALLI.head: head_male_vixmali
VIXMALLI.designer_note: Curses you, making you expend cards. If you kill them, they demoralize your allies.

CRAYOTE_SPITTER.title: Spitting Yote
CRAYOTE_SPITTER.designer_note: Spits at you, making your cards cost 1 more to play until it's played.

BANDIT_GOON2.title: Thief
BANDIT_GOON2.designer_note: Pins your cards down, making you pay actions to get them back.

LUMINITIATE_PROMOTED.designer_note: Curses you, making you expend cards. If you kill them, they demoralize your allies.

ENDO.bio: Though he doesn't look frail, his hands have a slight tremor when he prays.

DRONE_GOON.title: Drone Master
DRONE_GOON.head: head_male_spark_baron_dronemaster
DRONE_GOON.designer_note: Drones do significant damage if you don't deal with them. Drones are killed with number of hits rather than hitpoints, and deal damage to boss when exploding.

COIN_TRADER.designer_note: Protects allies, and buffs them. Won't surrender if any allies are still around.

SHROOG.name: Shroog

MURDER_BAY_BANDIT_CONTACT.bio:
It's not clear where, exactly, Nadan falls on the Spree pecking order, but he's important enough to get you what you want in Murder Bay as long as you stay in his good books.
Despite being a rotten crook, his general demeanor is much more charming than his blaster-burned grin.
MURDER_BAY_BANDIT_CONTACT.head: head_telvin
MURDER_BAY_BANDIT_CONTACT.name: Nadan
MURDER_BAY_BANDIT_CONTACT.designer_note: They cleave you, making bleeds last forever.
MURDER_BAY_BANDIT_CONTACT.title: Leader

MURDER_BAY_ADMIRALTY_CONTACT.head: head_female_kradeshi_02
MURDER_BAY_ADMIRALTY_CONTACT.bio: Oolo doesn't often ask for help, so it says volumes of how much crime has come to a head in Murder Bay. Nevertheless, she's tenacious enough to see the Admiralty to victory, and cunning enough to navigate the quagmire of bureaucracy and corruption in the ranks, while still coming out on top.
MURDER_BAY_ADMIRALTY_CONTACT.title: Intelligence Officer
MURDER_BAY_ADMIRALTY_CONTACT.name: Oolo

SAL.bio: Sold as a child to the lumin derricks out on the open sea, Sal was destined for a life of hard labor. But she was small and quick and smart, and she made herself useful to powerful criminals until she grew clever enough to collect on bounties instead.
